channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【EP135: Big Data Pipeline Cheatsheet for AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud】EP135：AWS、Azure 和 Google Cloud 的大数据管道备忘单

item.title: 【Event-Driven Architectural Patterns】事件驱动的架构模式
item.description: 【Event-driven architecture (EDA) is a software design approach emphasizing the production, detection, consumption, and reaction to events.】事件驱动架构（EDA）是一种强调事件的产生、检测、消费和反应的软件设计方法。

item.title: 【Data Sharing Between Microservices】微服务之间的数据共享
item.description: 【Microservices architecture has become popular for building complex, scalable software systems.】微服务架构在构建复杂、可扩展的软件系统方面已经变得很流行。

item.title: 【How Uber Manages Petabytes of Real-Time Data】Uber 如何管理 PB 级实时数据
【CAP, PACELC, ACID, BASE - Essential Concepts for an Architect’s Toolkit】CAP、PACELC、ACID、BASE - 架构师工具包的基本概念
item.description: 【In today's world, distributed systems have become ubiquitous, powering everything from social media platforms and e-commerce websites to financial systems and healthcare applications.】在当今世界，分布式系统已经无处不在，为从社交媒体平台和电子商务网站到金融系统和医疗保健应用程序的一切提供动力。
